title: WTT T206 Rare Backs for BL460
author: MVSNYC

posts.post_title: WTT T206 Rare Backs for BL460
posts.post_content:
I am considering trading most (or ALL) of these rare backs for a BL460 (depending on the player & condition of the BL460). i know there are a handful of people on N54 who have examples. PM me to discuss, will email scans of all, thanks for looking!


Drum 350- PSA 2- Gabby Street, Catching
Uzit- SGC 40- George Mullin, W/ Bat
Lenox (Black)- PSA 2- Howie Camnitz, Hands Over Head
Broad Leaf 350- SGC 20- Moose Grimshaw
Carolina Brights- Raw (vg)- Milligan, Portrait 
Piedmont 350-460 Factory No.42- PSA 2- Chief Bender, Pitching No Trees
Hindu (Brown)- PSA 5- Lefty Leifield, Pitching
Sovereign 460- PSA 3.5- Hooks Wiltse, Portrait W/ Cap
Cycle 460- PSA 3- Mickey Doolan, Batting
Tolstoi- SGC 50- Rube Geyer
El Principe De Gales- PSA 3.5- Topsy Hartsel
Old Mill (Base Ball Subjects)- PSA 3.5- John Frill
Polar Bear- PSA 3- Joe Lake, St. Louis W/ Ball
